channel.title: Tools on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Tools
item.description: MATLAB速 MATLAB速 is a computational environment (language and tools) designed primarily for numerical computation and manipulation. It is very useful for running Machine Learning experiments, and we will be using it as the primary programming environment for this course. You do not need any deep knowledge of MATLAB速 to complete the assignments but it will be necessary to learn some basics. MIT Information Services and Technology also provides some useful tips for a beginning MATLAB速 user on MIT’s server.
